maqras.text: 38|52|Ara tadera pase thakabe anatanayana samabayaskara.
38|53|Eta hisebera dinera jan'ya tomaderake deya pratisruti.
38|54|Niscaya eta amadera deya riyika ya nihsesa ha'oyara naya.
38|55|Eta'i. Ara niscaya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya rayeche nikrstatama pratyabartanasthala
38|56|jahannama, sekhane tara agnidagdha habe, kata nikrsta bisramasthala
38|57|eta'i. Kaje'i tara asbadana karuka phutanta pani o pumja [1].
38|58|Aro ache erupa bibhinna dharanera sasti [1].
38|59|E to eka bahini, tomadera sange prabesa karache. Tadera jan'ya ne'i kono abhinandana. Niscaya tara agune jbalabe.’
38|60|Anusarira balabe, ‘baram tomara'o, tomadera jan'ya'o kono abhinandana ne'i. Tomara'i to age amadera jan'ya etara byabastha karecha. Ata'eba kata nikrsta e abasasthala [1]!’
38|61|Tara balabe, 'he amadera raba! Ye etake amadera sam'mukhina kareche, agune tara sasti apani dbiguna bariye dina.
38|62|Tara ara'o balabe, 'amadera ki hala ye, amara yesaba lokake manda bale ganya karatama taderake dekhate pacchi na [1].
38|63|Tabe ki amara taderake (ahetuka) thatta-bidrupera patra mane karatama; na tadera byapare amadera drsti bibhrama ghateche [1]
38|64|niscaya eta bastaba satya--- jahannamidera e parasparika bada-pratibada.
38|65|Baluna, 'ami to ekajana satarkakari matra ebam satya kono ilah ne'i allaha chara, yini eka, prabala pratapasali.
38|66|Yini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, prabala parakramasali, mahaksamasila.
38|67|Baluna, 'eta eka mahasambada
38|68|ya theke tomara mukha phiriye niccha.
38|69|‘Urdhbaloka samparke amara kono jnana chila na yakhana tara badanubada karachila [1].
38|70|Amara kache to e ohi eseche ye, ami ekajana spasta satarkakari matra.
38|71|Smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba pheresataderake balechilena, 'ami manusa srsti karachi kada theke
38|72|Atahpara yakhana ami take susama karaba ebam tate amara ruha sancara karaba, takhana tomara tara prati sajadabanata hayo.
38|73|Takhana pheresatara sakale'i sajadabanata hala
38|74|ibalisa chara, se ahankara karala ebam kaphiradera antarbhukta hala.

38|75|Tini balalena, 'he ibalisa! Ami yake amara du'hate [1] srsti karechi, tara prati sajadabanata hate tomake kise badha dila? Tumi ki aud'dhatya prakasa karale, na tumi adhikatara ucca maryadasampanna
38|76|se balala, 'ami tara ceye srestha. Apani amake aguna theke srsti karechena ebam take srsti karechena kada theke.’
38|77|Tini balalena, 'tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o, kenana niscaya tumi bitarita.
38|78|‘Ara niscaya tomara upara amara la'nata thakabe, karmaphala dina paryanta.’
38|79|Se balala, 'he amara raba! Ata'eba apani amake sedina paryanta abakasa dina, ye dina taderake punarut'thita kara habe.
38|80|Tini balalena, 'tahale tumi abakasapraaptadera antarbhukta hale
38|81|‘nirdharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta.
38|82|Se balala, 'apanara ksamata-sam'manera sapatha! Abasya'i ami tadera saba'ike pathabhrasta karaba
38|83|‘tabe tadera madhye apanara ekanistha bandara byatita.
38|84|Tini balalena, ‘tabe eta'i satya, ara ami satya'i bali
38|85|abasya'i tomara dbara o tadera madhye yara tomara anusarana karabe tadera sabara dbara ami jahannama purna karaba.
38|86|Baluna, 'ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono pratidana ca'i na ebam ami krtrimatasrayidera antarbhukta na'i [1].
38|87|E to srstikulera jan'ya upadesa matra! [1].
38|88|Ara era sambada tomara abasya'i janabe, kichudina pare [1].
39|1|E kitaba parakramasali prajnamaya allahara kacha theke nayila ha'oya.
39|2|Niscaya amara apanara kache e kitaba satyasaha nayila karechi. Kaje'i allahara'ibadata karuna tamra anugatye ekanistha haye.

39|3|Jene rakhuna, abimisra anugatya allahara'i prapya. Ara yara allahara paribarte an'yaderake abhibhabakarupe grahana kare tara bale, 'amara to edera ibadata e jan'ye kari ye, era amaderake paripurnabhabe allahara sannidhye ene debe [1].’ Tara ye bisaye nijedera madhye matabheda karache niscaya allaha tadera madhye se byapare phayasala kare debena. Ye mithyabadi o kaphira, niscaya allaha take hidayata dena na.
39|4|Allaha santana grahana karate ca'ile tini tamra srstira madhye yake icche beche nitena. Pabitra o mahana tini! Tini allaha, eka, prabala pratapasali.

39|5|Tini yathayathabhabe asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena. Tini rata dbara dinake acchadita karena ebam ratake acchadita karena dina dbara [1]. Surya o camdake tini karechena niyamadhina. Pratyeke'i parikramana kare eka nirdista kala paryanta. Jene rakhe, tini parakramasali, ksamasila.

39|6|Tini tomaderake srsti karechena eka'i byakti hate. Tarapara tini tara theke jora srsti karechena [1]. Ara tini tomadera jan'ya nayila karechena ata jora ana'ama [2]. Tini tomaderake tomadera matrgarbhera traibidha andhakare paryayakrame srsti karechena. Tini'i allaha; tomadera raba; sarbamaya kartrtba tamra'i; tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i. Atahpara tomaderake kothaya phirano hacche

39|7|yadi tomara kuphari kara tabe (jene rakha) allaha tomadera mukhapeksi nana [1]. Ara tini tamra bandadera jan'ya kuphari pachanda karena na ebam yadi tomara krtajna ha'o tabe tini tomadera jan'ya ta-i pachanda karena. Ara kono bojha bahanakari aparera bojha bahana karabe na. Tarapara tomadera rabera kache'i tomadera phire ya'oya. Takhana tomara ya amala karate ta tini tomaderake abahita karabena. Niscaya antare ya ache tini ta samyaka abagata.
